casebody.data:
MISSION HOSPITALS
v.
RADIATION THERAPY. No. 498P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 3, 2008. Robert V. Bode, S. Todd Hemphill, Diana Evans Ricketts, Raleigh, Matthew A. Fisher, for Asheville Hematology. June S. Ferrell, Assistant Attorney General, for DHR. Susan H. Hargrove, Sean A. Timmons, Courtney H. Mischen, Raleigh, for NC Radiation Therapy. Allyson Jones Labbon, Terrill Johnson Harris, Greensboro, for Mission Hospitals. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2008 by Petitioner & Petitioner Intervenors for Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of September 2008." MARTIN, J., recused.
